meanings.definition: The quality or state of being nubby.
meanings.sent1: The nubbiness of the fabric made it feel rough.
meanings.sent2: I liked the nubbiness of the sweater; it felt cozy.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tongue licked the nubbiness of the blanket.
meanings.sent4: The nubbiness of the carpet resembled tiny hills.
meanings.sent5: The nubbiness of the towel provided extra grip.

meanings.sent1: She avoided the nubbiness of the wall as it scratched her hand.
meanings.sent2: The tree bark had a unique nubbiness to it.
meanings.sent3: The nubbiness of the bread crust made it hard to chew.
meanings.sent4: The old book cover had a comforting nubbiness under his fingers.
meanings.sent5: The nubbiness of the rock surface made climbing difficult.

meanings.sent1: The nubbiness of the cactus made it look prickly.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar had tiny nubbiness along its body.
meanings.sent3: The nubbiness of the toy dinosaur's skin felt bumpy.
meanings.sent4: The nubbiness of the popcorn kernels made them crunchy.
meanings.sent5: The nubbiness of the tire tread provided good traction.
